candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (3 votes): claude_haiku: Crypto mining with similar characteristics to WULF/RIOT. Extreme volatility, sector rotation sensitivity, and weather-driven operational costs (cooling/energy). Recently beaten down, creating reversal opportunity.; xai: CLSK (CleanSpark) mirrors WULF and MARA as a crypto mining play with high volatility and sensitivity to Bitcoin's boom/bust cycles. It has shown strong trends with sharp reversals, amplified by energy cost fluctuations and regulatory news. Recent weakness from broader crypto sell-offs positions it for mean reversion as adoption grows and sector rotates back to digital assets; aligns with commodity (energy-dependent mining) and crypto exposure patterns, plus retail hype potential during rallies.

Similar to EQT's commodity-driven volatility but with offshore leverage.
